error.signature: TypeError: Object of type X is not JSON serializable
error.regex: TypeError: Object of type .+ is not JSON serializable

verdict.summary: json.dumps can't serialize the object. Common: datetime, set, numpy, Decimal, UUID.

dead_ends.action: Use str() on everything before serializing
dead_ends.why_fails: Loses type information â€” can't deserialize back correctly
Pickle is Python-only, insecure, and not human-readable

workarounds.action: Write a custom encoder: class CustomEncoder(json.JSONEncoder)
Convert the specific type before serializing: list(set), str(uuid)
